author: Brian Costa
title: Red Gerard Soars to Gold in Snowboard Slopestyle - WSJ
text:
BONGPYEONG, South Korea—Four hours before the biggest competition of his life, 17-year-old American snowboarder Red Gerard was having a very 17-year-old problem. His alarm was going off. It was 6 a.m. He did not feel like moving.
“Red, you out of bed yet?” asked his roommate and teammate, Kyle Mack, at 6:20 a.m. Sunday.
“Ahhhh, fine,” Gerard...
